title: NA League of Legends Download
body:
I want to play LoL of the North American servers, but my C: \ drive size is not enough to store it, I tried moving / installing it to another drive, but it failed to start.
Help me please.

I'm feeling{{summoner:14}}   :)

replies.body: It's best to install League to your default drive to make sure it runs correctly. If that isn't really an option, try running a repair through the client options or let me know a little more about what's going wrong.
